dimensions: Warp x Weft: 180 x 16.5 cm (5 ft. 10 7/8 in. x 6 1/2 in.)
title: Scarf
medium: Technique: tubular double cloth(two intercrossing plain weave structures); wefts overspun resulting in a textured finish
